title: LF Gold Supp and Top
body:
Hey im the captain of Team Synergies and me and my team are searching for a support and a top laner! We have some aspect u may have to join us:
- Minimun of gold
- Have a mic
- Play often
- Great champion pool.
If  u wanna join us fill this:
IGN:
Age:
Lane:
Good at:
Bad at:
Playing since:
Team experience:
Rank:

Ty for checking that out and hope u join our team!!!
PS: Je parle français ;D
Spiralfie

replies.body:

Lane: sup
Good at: all the support champion, have to brush of on thresh 
Bad at: thresh and nami
Playing since: season 6
Rank: gold 3/ gold 2 promos felx

IGN: Fuzzy Dice79
Age: 20
Lane: Support
Good at: Most support champs
Bad at: Tahm (I can play him but Ièm not yet consistent on him), MF, Malz and Zyra
Playing since: Season 5
Team experience: Been a team captain and member of past teams but was on hiatus cuz of school
Rank: G5

Puis moi aussi je parle francais :)
